mapper.select: select no, content, user_no as userNo, nickname, password, to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd/hh24:mi:ss') as regDate, build_no as buildNo from ssh_reply where build_no = #{buildNo} order by no desc
mapper.insert: insert into ssh_reply(no, content, user_no, nickname, password, build_no) values(seq_ssh_reply_no.nextval, #{content}, #{userNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{nickname}, #{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buildNo})
